name: EarnYourShirt
0:
”Alexa, open Earn Your Shirt”
”Alexa, start Earn Your Shirt”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earn your shirt
des: Earn Your Shirt is the world's first soccer training Alexa skill. It can answer any questions you have about football and can give you any advice that you need! Are you struggling with your first touch? Then ask Alexa: How do I improve my first touch? Do you have a bad coach? You can ask Alexa that too. The possibilities are endless, start getting answers today by enabling the Earn Your Shirt skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
